title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, June 6, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, June 6, 2013
description: A trade spat between China and the EU threatens the exports of solar panels and wine. As the IRS comes under fire for its expensive team building conferences, we take a look at how common these events are these days. And how far should states go to lure businesses?
byline: Rob Schmitz, Bruce Johnson, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, David Brancaccio, Shannon Mullen, Diane Swonk and Chris Farrell
teaser: A trade spat between China and the EU threatens the exports of solar panels and wine. As the IRS comes under fire for its expensive team building conferences, we take a look at how common these events are these days. And how far should states go to lure businesses?
